name: Interactive Advertising Bureau Europe
goal: Established in 1998, IAB Europe exists to support and promote the growth of the European online and interactive marketing industry. Representing 30 National IABs and Partners across Europe and over 5,500 companies, IAB Europe is the trade association of the European digital and interactive marketing industry.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Consumer Affairs, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Proposed ePrivacy Regulation
Proposed Directive on Contracts for Digital Content

Digital Single Market
General Data Protection Regulation
EU-US Privacy Shield
Unfair Commercial Practices Directive
eCommerce Directive
AVMS Directive
TTIP
